alert.note: Alert for Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Challis, Pahsimeroi Valleys; Frank Church Wilderness; Lost River Range; Lost River Valleys; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region; Wood River Foothills (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 21 at 2:35AM MST until November 24 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM WEDNESDAY TO 5 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 7 inches, except 6 to 9 inches on ridge tops and elevations above passes. * WHERE...All elevations of the Big and Little Lost River regions, the Challis and Pahsimeroi valleys, the Sawtooth mountains and alpine basins such as Stanley, and the Big and Little Wood River basins. * WHEN...From 5 PM Wednesday to 5 AM MST Friday. The first few hours will have light snow accumulations on ridges and on passes, but will intensify after midnight on Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact holiday travel on Thanksgiving Day and Thursday night. Motorists planning travel for the holiday should strongly consider a Wednesday departure.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
